title: The parking area to be made available at individual site shall be at minimum 100 sq
clause_text: The parking area to be made available at individual site shall be at minimum 100 sq.m. at one place either at Ground floor / Stilt floor or first floor.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: The parking area to be made available at individual site shall be at minimum 100 sq.m. at one place either at Ground floor / Stilt floor or first floor.
